How To Unpack games from CSD
It's pretty simple. You got an ISO image of the game or retail disk. It's got *.csm and *.csd files in it. 

REMEMBER: you can't unpack the game before its release date! 

So the game release date has come, what you do? 

Get the manifest files for the game. Program will inform you what files are needed (later versions, not 1.6 alpha 0). You'll also probably find them here or somewhere on the Internet 
Go to Program Settings, set there GCF folder. If Steam is installed, it would be like ...SteamSteamApps 
Manifest files put in ...Steamdepotcache folder, Phoenix will search for them in that folder 
Now go to CSD Unpacker tab 
Select CSD file in the game disk (or image or whatever) 
Select Destination folder where to unpack 
SelectCheck all the items on the left-bottom list 
Click Unpack button and wait
